author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Capture time spent calling the EventSetup during processing of
  an event.
- Assign time to Source when doing delayed read during prefetching
  data for a module.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Using FastTimerService with a PAT workflow filled in the unknown 50% of the timing.
title: Extend FastTimerService to watch EventSetup calls
